name: DREADED BOT
description: This is a simple whatsapp bot built with nodejs and baileys with MD support.

PREFIX.description: choose your prefix for dreaded. To prevent errors and confusion you must set a prefix

MENUTYPE.description: Choose what kind of menu bot will display, put either LINK, IMAGE or VIDEO (must be in capital letters)

MENULINK.description: Put an image link that will be used in picture menu.

DEV.description: Put any phone numbers you want to be bot owner without + or spaces "," Ex: 254114018035, 254741889898

EVENTS.description: Put TRUE if you want bot to send welcome and goodbye messages

NOT_OWNER_MSG.description: Put a message that the bot will send if a parameter that requires only owner user is violated. Example: Owner only

BOT_ADMIN_MSG.description: Put a message that the bot will send if a parameter that requires bot to be admin is violated. Example: Bot is not admin!

ADMIN_MSG.description: Put a message that the bot will send if a parameter that requires only owner user is violated. Example: Only admins are allowed to use this command

BAD_WORD.description: List words separated witj commas that will be considered as bad and will trigger bot to kick. Example: fuck, pussy, hoe

BAD_WORD_KICK.description: Put here TRUE if you want the bot to automatically kick group members using words that you have listed as bad

GROUP_ONLY_MSG.description: Put a message that the bot will send if a parameter that works in group chats only is violated. Example: This command will work in groups only

AUTOREAD.description: Put here TRUE if you want bot to automatically bluetick messages in private.

ANTIBOT.description: Put TRUE if you want bot to remove other bots.

ANTIFOREIGN.description: Put TRUE if you want bot to remove numbers which do not include your set COUNTRY_CODE.

ANTITAG.description: Put TRUE if you want bot to remove members tagging or hidetagging

ANTILINK.description: Put TRUE if you want bot to remove people sending links.

MODE.description: Type PRIVATE if you don't want other people to use the bot or PUBLIC if you want everyone to access.

RECORDING_TYPINGGC.description: Type TRUE if you want bot to show fake recording/typing in group chats.

WA_PRESENCE.description: This is your WhatsApp Presence Status: Here's how to set it up: Type *typing* if you want bot to show typing..., Type *recording* if you want bot to show recording..., Type *online* if you want bot to be always online, Leave this field blank if you want bot to show your actual presence.

RECORDING_TYPINGGC.description: Type TRUE if you want bot to show fake recording/typing in group chats.

AUTOVIEW_STATUS.description: Type TRUE if you want bot to automatically read all status update

AUTOBIO.description: Type TRUE if you want bot to show autoupdate it's bio constantly

AUTODOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Type TRUE if you want bot to automatically download and send status updates to its inbox.

SESSION.description: Paste the session id that you received in whatsapp after linking the bot. It's used for authentication.

COUNTRY_CODE.description: Enter your country code without +. Example: 254 for Kenya. This will allow bot to detect and remove foreigners if commanded

APP_NAME.description: Enter the app name you entered above.

HEROKU_API.description: Enter your heroku API or leave blank.
